name: Rout (Pompous Rhombus)
description:
Not every problem can be solved by violence, but this one sure can...

Rout is an in-development turn based RPG game where you select 3 characters to go head-to-head with 3 enemies. Plan out your actions, strategize plays, and try to beat the AI with your intelligence and prowess.

Rout is in development. Please consider leaving feedback, as this game is still in development. Survey links to fill out are linked below.

Survey for before playing

Survey for after playing
